availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, carpenter. native. Resided in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1860. Married Bettie A. Rice Rickets in Taylor County, Kentucky on April 14, 1864.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1. Eight Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon District 1, p. 37. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Marion, p. 22. Kentucky, County Marriages, 1873-1965 Ancestry, Taylor County, 1864. Alabama, Deaths and Burials Index, 1881-1974 Ancestry.
